website_summaries.verdict: Off the charts in terms of fashionable looks, comfortable wear, and affordable price. If you don't mind layering it in very cold weather, this jacket is a great value.
pros: Constructed of fleece that's warm and comfortable
Can be worn by itself or layered with other jackets on extremely cold days
cons: Too lightweight to be worn by itself in extreme wintry conditions

customer_reviews.title: Darker green than expected, not as “heathery” as pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought the primary green heather. The heather is definitely not as heathery as the photos. It’s almost solid green. It’s also a little darker than the pictures as well. I was expecting a lighter green color but this is true green. Like Ieprechaun green. I also don’t like the heat sealed logo that a lot of companies are doing instead of embroidery. It looks cheap. For the price TNF charges for their stuff, I expect more than a thermal transfer logo. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light 2nd layer to wear while at work after throwing out a Columbia fleece that I had for YEARS. This is exactly what I was looking for. I went with the grey heathered variant and am very pleased with it. The color is great, the fit is excellent, and it is just the right thickness to keep me warm. The quality is typical of North Face products so I expect this to last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and a bit thin... But i will keep it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dark grey jacket. Nice thin jacket if you are looking for something to wear inside or on a cool day. Not great for real cold weather. The sleeves are also 2 inches too long for me. I'm keeping the jacket... But I can't say it was worth the 80 bucks... Amazon is also starting to suck more and more with delivery dates.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Easy review... 5 star jacket here no Question
customer_reviews.text: Great stylish jacket ....it is not tapered or suited to be even when you have broad shoulders so it will look a bit uneven in the back, until you zip the jacket up. Northface has a winner here. Especially when the jacket goes on sale for $40 after the new version comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Richardson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2", 235 lbs and the XL fits me perfect. The Dark Grey Heather is darker than the image shown. TNF logo and outline around the chest pocket zipper are barely visible (I have a light shining on the jacket in the picture). I love the color regardless. It's a great looking full zip jacket. I'll probably order another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and construction
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, logo on front is not very visible and there is not one on the back shoulder as you would expect on a North Face product?!?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up if your athletic/muscular build
customer_reviews.text: Order up. I’m 6ft 185ish muscular build I have another N face that’s a M fits perfect; this one however is a fitted/slim fit jacket. I’m returning the M for a L. Looks amazing though!
customer_reviews.author: TStres

customer_reviews.title: Another High Quality Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, just like all of my North Face jackets. It's lightweight, comfy, and rather stylish for a casual full zip. The only problem I have with it is its strong chemical smell. Be sure to wash it before wearing, otherwise you'll be smelling the factory it came from all day long. Even after a wash though, the smell lingers. Overall, regardless of the factory smell (which is now dissipating), I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Zach

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice looking. My son was given a choice of 4 shirts/jackets as a gift for Christmas. This is the one he picked. It's better looking in person than in the picture. If he's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves it..
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6"0 and 160 pounds and the XL fits him well. I would have went up one more size just for the arms but overall its good. He does say that its not as warm as his other ones and it is kind of thin. I was a little disappointed by that because it is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks great, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks great, very comfortable. Breathable can go from hot weather (108) to cool easily. I wear in hospital and outside to car. Seriously one of favs and better all around light jacket. Got one for wife who's either cold or hot (depending when personal summer hits) and she finds comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: cha

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for running. It fit perfectly as an XL and I wear XL on shirts, coats, etc... I like the green color and it kept me warm in the cool spring morning weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Since the item description says “sweatshirt” I did not expect it to be a heavyweight. Makes a great layer under parka in cold days.
customer_reviews.author: DBAnc

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - loved this thing but QC missed this one. I've had it for 30 days, wore it a couple days a week and the main zipper came off in the wash already?? 2 times through the washer and I can't wear it 😒. Pretty dissaponted considering North face normally is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: My Least Favorite Canyonlands
customer_reviews.text: I get at least one canyonlands a year, sometimes 2. This is by far the worst. Size runs big. It’s soft and unstructured. Looks messy. If you like the sloppy in pajamas look and feel, this is for you. If you like the more structured clean cut look, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sump Erson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: For me this is a great light jacket to wear on cool days/nights, either outside or around the house. I run warm and only need a light layer at times, especially in southern CA. It's really soft and comfortable. I may get one more in another color.
customer_reviews.author: JFP

customer_reviews.title: High quality fleece. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest jacket I've ever owned and its made of high quality materials. It just feels like luxury. My only complaint is The North Face logo on mine doesnt show up very well but thats a non issue. This thing is super nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Joel Mugleston

customer_reviews.title: Orange north face fleece review
customer_reviews.text: It fits a little too large for me in my opinion. The color is nice, the style is nice and the material is nice. This is meant to be a thin windbreaker type jacket. I wear it in the house when I’m cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice Warm Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Husband for Christmas and he Loved it. He typically wears a large and this fit him just like his other shirts, so it was true to size. I loved the color on him, it goes well with a lot of other colors. He really liked it and wears it quite a bit during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for early morning Fall Golfing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light flexible layer for hiking or golfing. Ideal for fall or winter mornings in U.S Southwest.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: excellent jacket and great quality
customer_reviews.text: this brand has always been one of my favorites, this jacket in specific is one of my favorites cause is very comfy and you can use it wearing pants or even wearing jeans and it looks so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sucks
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week the zipper began to malfunction. Probably wont by north face. Possible Patagonia.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Light weight / good value
customer_reviews.text: The exterior is a bit shiny and the sleeves a bit long for my 32" arms, but I really like that it breaths and is a great weight for Phx., Az weather 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket. It fits true to size based on the size chart provided and the sleeves are long which I like. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: EG1192

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for. I have a couple other of these same that are pullovers. Like this one better. The green is very bright. Super comfy to wear and just the right insulation for cool mornings or evenings. This is a year-round wear jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Video Chili

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight good construction
customer_reviews.text: I like full zip jacket or sweatshirt that I can wear over a button down shirt - this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: super classy as well as practical!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift and i am so happy with it, it is better than i expected it is super elegant considering it is athletic apparel, the versatility of the jacket makes it a must in every men's wardrobe
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Fdz

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It’s nice warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. The shady blue is a bit darker ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this . The shady blue is a bit darker than pictured but it's a nice color. It is thin but that was what I was looking for so it works great. I went one size up based on other reviews and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Another great gift for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: My partner is going to love this! Nice material. Great for layering.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Agard

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the jacket. Good fit and quality for XL
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a very good jacket for the money. Overall, I’m disappointed. It would be ok if it was $50 but not for what I paid. I honestly wonder if it’s authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and fit. Love the look too. I was set on getting a Columbia fleece and ended up getting two of these and this style as a hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: sonox

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, but too light and not warm enough for myself....
customer_reviews.author: Robert Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. The recipient said it was perfect, color and fit
customer_reviews.author: Frank K

customer_reviews.title: Light jacket
customer_reviews.text: The personification of a light jacket, but I love it. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at a clothing store and liked it so much I bought two more through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dupas family

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6'3", thin build, and it fits him perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, warm jacket
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that the color would be too light, but it's good. The jacket is good for me down to about 45 degrees with gloves and a scarf.
customer_reviews.author: SMM

customer_reviews.title: North Face
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light jacket. In my opinion they run slightly small so you may need to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: schmirretti

customer_reviews.title: Boring...basic.....
customer_reviews.text: Very basic design and not functional either as a wind breaker or a warm jacket. Lacks style and function.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Everyday go to....
customer_reviews.text: Well made fits great. I’m a large have three of these in medium for a nice close fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This quickly became my son's favorite jacket. He loves the pockets. Wears it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Fav
customer_reviews.text: Ok my fav. True fit. Not too heavy or light. Wear in chilly weather.
customer_reviews.author: cha

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Fits juuust a shade more snugly than most NF products, but it plays with the sporty cut of the top. I love this jacket. Good for fall weather and inside buildings where the A/C is cranked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket. Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was a gift for my son. It fits well though short. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Comfy not too hot jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket! Fits right and mainly use it at work. Since I work in the operating room it definitely keeps me warm enough but it’s not overbearing. Love the pockets too.
customer_reviews.author: DocZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fabric and color. Short in the body for my tall grandson.
customer_reviews.author: R Evans

customer_reviews.title: This fit perfect! I wore this every day on my trip ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'0, 190lbs. This fit perfect! I wore this every day on my trip to Iceland in June. it was perfect for the rainy 40 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Fits fine feels comfy when wearing and couldn’t ask for a better product
customer_reviews.author: Brian christen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and fits like it should. And the arm length is what it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Foster

customer_reviews.title: this one didn’t hold up like the others
customer_reviews.text: I have several North Face Canyonlands. Unfortunately, this one didn’t hold up like the others. After the second wear, the upper chest pocket sealing border area started to peel back. Looking to NF for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, didn't work for me...but see who it did work for.
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was perfect, so much so, that even though it didn't fit me....my co-worker saw me try it on, and bought it from me so I didn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small - I have a some Northface gear from a few years ago in small size and figured it would fit. But it was much larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: looking forward to my kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and it looks great on him. It’s flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie LaPrise

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: So comfy you don't want to take it off. Just what I wanted. You got to pay to play
customer_reviews.author: Dexter T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket for layering!!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was exactly as listed. Shipping was fast simple and efficient. This is now my go to light jacket and is perfect for creating multiple layers as temperatures change. The pocket on the front upper section is perfect for storing you smartphone, tickets, credit card or other small items. Highly recommend the jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: ejb912

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is nice quality however it is about a 1/2 size too small.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is an little different not as cozy as fleece but is nice anyways
customer_reviews.author: victor c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that the Northface logo wasn't on the back of the jacket. That was my only complaint. Otherwise nice jacket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: great jacket at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Don't like too heavy of a jacket and this one is just the right level of comfort

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and warm
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight jacket and as a liner for layering with a jacket shell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. Very warm, and can be worn under a coat or as a light spring jacket.

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't wear it yet but it impressed me off its quality, it's amazing

customer_reviews.title: Shipping quality
customer_reviews.text: Shipping quality was very poor. Package had hole in it with glue dried on jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Check the zipper
customer_reviews.text: I order online because I don’t have time go to the store or time to send the jacket back. It fits fine but someone should have looked at the the main thing about a jacket THE ZIPPER! I will just take the loss.
customer_reviews.author: mike norwood

customer_reviews.title: Size may differ.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hoodie when you don’t want a hood. I own an XL Northface hoodie and ordered the same size. Had to return as I needed a L instead.  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: William Orr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it, he wanted something medium weight, not too warm, and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for the spring and a rainy day, it keeps you warm more than I thought it would, great purchase

customer_reviews.title: Not embroidered logo!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that a “the north face “ product and it is not embroidered,cheap rubbbery plastic , would not purchase this item again..
customer_reviews.author: A meza

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and it fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Gift for boyfriend. He loved it and it fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Material and Great Fit! You Get What You Pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as expected...I really like the material and it's perfect for a not so cold winter day...
customer_reviews.author: Lion heart 15

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. It’s is great for fall and spring.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hertter

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas, and he loved it. I also think it looks very good. It is very thin, much thinner than a regular fleece jacket, however it is just as warm as other fleece jackets he has owned. It takes up a lot less space when folded compared to other fleece jackets. He uses it on days when it's chilly enough for a jacket and not quite cold enough for a heavy coat. It works as a good wind-breaker too.
customer_reviews.author: LauraA1294

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cool.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for cool light weather. I can also wear it under a bigger jacket if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super comfortable. able to bunch up the sleeves and play golf in cold weather!!

customer_reviews.title: True fit. True Color
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'11'' 200 Pounds. Bought size L. True fit. True Color

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: True to size, love the color, made a great gift!

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, because I like the lightness of the jacket.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and product
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson who loved the way it fit and felt. Also fast shipment

customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt came in quite faster than I expected. It fit my son very well with a little room to grow.

customer_reviews.text: Please contact me The dark grey jacket north face logo is coming off after one wash... Thank you

customer_reviews.text: Great light weight jacket! I receive compliments all the time. However, do not expect this jacket to keep you warm durning cold weather events.

customer_reviews.text: Not the same fit as others I had purchased of the same size.

customer_reviews.text: This TNF fleece is excellent value, fits as expected, and seller is great.

customer_reviews.text: Great base layer over a fitted t-shirt. Jacket is fitted.

customer_reviews.title: So far all good
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are great, the material seems to be hefty and not prone to easily tearing or wearing out any time soon, the zippers are easy to slide, and the fit has a good tailored feel.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and the color also match with pretty much everything.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not too warm.
customer_reviews.text: Not as warm as I was expecting. Good fit. Seams on arms are distracting.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised, and I am pleased with it. Roger S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fleece
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light-mid weight fleece. The Kodak blue color is amazing. Very comfy and the clothes fits great, I'm 6'2" and 225. I wear it when walking around town or running in the cold. I own 3 others in different colors and different zipper styles. Full zip is the best

customer_reviews.title: it's more like hoodie material but my fiancé loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is not a thick winter jacket, it's more like hoodie material but my fiancé loves it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. Very comfortable for the 55 - 68 degree temperature range.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great But Not For Serious Adventures
customer_reviews.text: This jacket looks and feels great. However, it's thin and not very warm. Feels comfortable (with thermals underneath) up to about 10 deg C. I wouldn't recommend it for weather conditions close to freezing.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, only issue is the material is not really strong, few threads are off

product_meta.title: The North Face Mens Canyonlands Full-Zip Sweater Mens
feature_bullets: SOFT FLEECE. Constructed from stretch, smooth-face fleece, this full zip sweatshirt has a brushed interior, providing warmth without the weight.
STANDARD FIT. A roomy fit allows you to wear undershirts for layered warmth. Hybrid set-in raglan sleeves allow you to move comfortably when you're adventuring through cooler temps.

MIDWEIGHT WARMTH. A stand-up collar with micro elastic binding helps block the wind and lets you bundle up in chilly weather. This jacket is great for hitting the trails and delivers midweight warmth without the extra weight.
SECURE STORAGE. Two side zip pockets and a zip chest pocket help keep your small valuable safely stowed away.
THE NORTH FACE. A signature TNF logo at the chest adds a classic look to your jacket.
